<url>get-featured</url>

# Get Featured


### Add Widget to Your Website
You will need to add a widget to your bot website home page to be featured.

**HTML Widget Syntax**:
```
<a href="https://nblist.glitch.me/bots/[yourBotId]">
  <img src="https://nblist.glitch.me/api/v1/bots/[botId]/widget" alt="View on NBList">
</a>
```

Replace [yourBotId] with the ID of your bot.

---

### Link Your Bot Page on Your Website
This is an alternative to the latter option. You will need to add a URL to your

**HTML Link Syntax**:
```
<a href="/bots/[yourBotId]">View Cool Bot on NBList</a>
```

**Markdown**: `[The Best Bot on Discord](https://nblist.glitch.me/bots/[yourBotId])`
**HTML**: `<a href="https://nblist.glitch.me/bots/[yourBotId]">The Best Bot on Discord</a>`

Replace [yourBotId] with the ID of your bot.

---
